provider

Class EventsProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • provider.EventsProvider

  • public class EventsProvider
extends java.lang.Object
    Provider for attendance events (entry of employee's arrive or leave).
    Author:
    Martin Kadlec, A11N0109P(ZCU)
